message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today. Given its value, I think a starting price of $20,000 is fair. What do you think?
I appreciate your time, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle at $16,000?
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but the product's value is considerably higher than your offer reflects. How about we meet closer to the middle at $18,000?
I appreciate your persistence, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to go up to $14,000. Can you meet me at $14,500?
